title: The Exchange: PBS CEO Paula Kerger
description:
Streaming is upending the media landscape, including public television. Its funding model, local structure and social mandate make broadcaster PBS unlike any other U.S outlet. Its longest-serving boss, Paula Kerger, discusses the challenges and possibilities of the new era.
 
 See acast.com/privacy for privacy and opt-out information.
